text: Christopher Nolan’s casting of Ledger was questioned – until critics saw his electrifying turn as Gotham City’s mayhem maker, a performance that’s led directly to A-list actors Jared Leto and Joaquin Phoenix playing the character
title: The Dark Knight turns 10: how Heath Ledger’s Joker fuelled our archvillain obsession
